entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • MemoryStream.Read() throws ArgumentOutOfRangexception in .NET 6 but ArgumentException in .NET 5 #61994
  • Unable to deserialize ienumerables that is not a list #61993
  • .NET seems to special-case renaming of EML files #61991
  • .NET SDK for Android + `$(EnableLLVM)`=True + `$(AotAssemblies)`=True + Windows: bad path quoting? #61979
  • Can't Publish Runtime Test Projects #61978
  • ANSICodePage returns zero for Traditional_Spanish_CI_AS collation #61977
    7.0.0
  • EventCounters pipeline on linux fires twice per cycle #61971
  • ApiController return new object() Error in .Net6 #61995
  • HttpHeaders Remove will throw for some header names #61968
    Future
  • BackgroundService.StartAsync() should await ApplicationStarted #61967
  • [API Proposal]: Review FxCop rules remaining to port #61964
  • QueryXmlWriter does not support Async #61963
  • [NativeAOT] Breaks constructor of System.Management.WbemDefPath #61960
  • Regressions in System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests.Perf_Regex_Common #61972
  • [API Proposal]: Making "Process asynchronous tasks as they complete" easy by using IAsyncEnumerable #61959
  • [API Proposal]: is there any methods can implement [:,:,::-1] operate in python #61957
  • Shifting a value in two directions once by a variable produces an unnecessary `and` instruction. #61955
  • Improve CreateDirectory on Windows #61954
  • ManagementEventWatcher only watches the 32-bit registry in an x64 .Net application #61980

Closed

  • Share RegexInterpreter.FindFirstChar logic with SymbolicRegexMatcher #60885
    7.0.0
  • The value of the parameter cannot be changed when debugging the WASM project. #61974
    Future
  • Test failure JIT/Methodical/eh/disconnected/catchbeforetrybody_d/catchbeforetrybody_d.sh #61900
    7.0.0
  • Remove "requestId" arguments from HTTP tests loopback server API #58239
    7.0.0
  • [Analyzer Proposal]: Create immutable types once #61961
  • Garbage collection method is not manageable by environment variables in .net 6 #61674
    7.0.0
  • The purpose of the ref folder in dotnet/runtime source #61965
  • Move throw calls inside `ThrowHelper.Get*` methods #59378
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] Malformed `testResults.xml` causing CI test runs to fail #61749
    7.0.0
  • Proxy-Support header case sensitive causes proxied API failure when using HttpClient #61414
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add extension method AsReadOnly() for IDictionary<TKey, TValue> #33033
    7.0.0
  • Add .Clear() method to MemoryCache #45593
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Please add a method to the C# library to copy a directory with all its contents #61873
  • cmake failure when building mono+libs -os Android #61953
  • StreamReader can use ArrayPool instead of always allocating buffers #60694
  • It seems .NET 5 tries to precompile expressions when params available even if usage is conditional (IF) #60735
  • JsonSerializer does not serialize DBNull.Value as null #418
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix calling NLS with Cultures has alternative sort names #61992
    area-System.Globalization, 7.0.0
  • Use GeneratedDllImport in System.Diagnostics.EventLog #61990
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.0
  • [mono] Remove support for Classic Xamarin for the Selector.GetHandle optimization, and add newer platforms. #61989
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [mono] Restrict the Selector.GetHandle intrinsic to GetHandle implementations that take an IntPtr. #61987
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • make System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates compliant with interop guidelines - part 4 #61986
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Handle when DestroyStructure API passes null to the IL marshaller #61985
    area-Interop-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Update hash of the new CSE when resizing #61984
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Ensure that we don't try to get the simdBaseJitType for scalar intrinsics #61982
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [WIP] HTTP Pool Manager Scavange fix #61976
    * NO MERGE *, NO REVIEW, area-System.Net.Http
  • Use GeneratedDllImport in System.DirectoryServices #61975
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.0
  • Splitting the hardware intrinsic tests into more test groupings #61973
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Don't merge CI test only] #61970
  • [release/6.0] Environment variable should override property for gcServer. #61969
    Servicing-consider, area-GC-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • Add some tests that validate debug info through ETW events #61962
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Reorganize libs.native #61958
    community-contribution
  • Add RequiresDynamicCodeAttribute to runtime #61956
    new-api-needs-documentation, linkable-framework, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Start building a universal System.Linq.Expressions library #61952
    area-System.Linq.Expressions
  • Make sanitizers work again in coreclr #61948
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution

Merged

  • Check for time-sensitive work when worker thread starvation is ongoing #61930
    area-System.Threading, 7.0.0
  • Use GeneratedDllImport in Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.WindowsServices, System.Drawing.Primitives, System.Management, System.Security.Cryptography.ProtectedData, System.Speech, System.Windows.Extensions #61949
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.0
  • Stabilize host's UpgradeCode and ProviderKey #61810
    area-Setup, 7.0.0
  • removed argument requestId from loopbackserver.cs #58678
    area-System.Net, 7.0.0
  • [mono] Don't use recursion in mono_ssa_rename_vars #61677
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Disable several GenericMath tests on iOS/tvOS #61922
    area-System.Runtime
  • Environment variable should override property for gcServer. #61950
    area-GC-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • FileSystem.Unix: Directory.Delete: remove per item syscall. #59520
    area-System.IO, tenet-performance, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [System.Text.Json] Move inline throw statements to `ThrowHelper` #61746
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] workaround test results corruption #61841
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update Proxy-Support check to be case insensitive #61446
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Added AsReadOnly extension methods for IDictionary<T, U> and IList<T> #61172
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Add Clear() to MemoryCache #57631
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Caching, 7.0.0
  • Disable changing align nop padding to breakpoints for arm64 under jit stress #61951
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1482158 #61858
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add backtracking loops, backreferences, and if-then-else constructs to Regex "simplified" code gen #61906
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions

Updated

  • [wasm] Misc CI/test run improvements #61937
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Improve some cases of bad debug info propagation in optimized code #61846
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • WIP: first group project for type generator tests 0-99 #61942
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [6.0] Check for time-sensitive work when worker thread starvation is ongoing #61931
    area-System.Threading, 6.0.x
  • Add zlib-ng library, optimized for ARM64 #61883
    area-System.IO.Compression, 7.0.0
  • [DRAFT][MONO][TEST] Wasm AOT runtime tests #57963
    area-Infrastructure-mono, runtime-mono, wasm-aot-test
  • Brand release/6.0-maui branch appropriately #61792
  • Enable QJFL and OSR by default for x64 #61934
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [DRAFT][wasm] debug multiple runtimes #61848
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Initial version with the following features: #61926
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [wasm] [debugger] Eval fixes for static class eval #61660
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Updating the x64 casting behavior to be IEEE 754 compliant and to use saturation for overflow #61761
    breaking-change, area-CodeGen-coreclr, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Remove AOT warnings for S.Drawing.Common #61567
    area-System.Drawing, community-contribution
  • prevent concurrent access to IO buffers on macOS #61723
    area-System.Net.Security, os-mac-os-x, 7.0.0
  • Reduce repeated variable add operations to a single multiply. #61663
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Implement PEM exports for RSA PKCS#1 and ECPrivateKey #61946
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, cryptographic-docs-impact
  • Support zero-byte reads on HTTP response streams #61913
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • Unify lengthof/string_lengthof -like macros #61537
    community-contribution
  • Build HttpStress and SslStress with live-built runtime using current TFM #61689
    area-System.Net
  • Cache LastAccessed during MemoryCache compaction #61187
    area-Extensions-Caching
  • [WIP]: Accelerate additional cross platform hardware intrinsics #61649
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Clean-up CacheEntry #59110
    area-Extensions-Caching, community-contribution
  • [Mono] Fix support for nested structs with explicit layout #61467
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Add test for ignoring stepping into hidden function. #61312
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Remove string allocation from XmlTextEncoder.WriteCharEntity #61774
    area-System.Xml, needs more info, community-contribution
  • Cleanup some code using ECAlgorithm #61943
    area-System.Security
  • [Wasm] JS modularization #61313
    arch-wasm, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Disable poisoning for large structs #61601
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • Use separate partials for iOS&tvOS instead of UnknowUnix in System.Diagnostics.Process #61871
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process
  • Fix Android crypto asserts #61827
    area-System.Security, os-android, community-contribution
  • Support Process.Start() on MacCatalyst #61507
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process
  • Skip Linq tests, which are not supported in interpreter only build (without FEATURE_COMPILE) #61914
    * NO MERGE *, area-System.Linq.Expressions
  • Use RunContinuationsAsynchronously for block completion tasks #61140
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • Expose general purpose Crc32 APIs #61558
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Use SIMD operations in InitBlkUnroll/CopyBlkUnroll and increase unroll limit up to 128 bytes #61030
    arch-arm64, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Change OperIsBlkOp test to check for store block operators #60878
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • S.IO.StringReader: Use ReadOnlySpan.IndexOfAny in ReadLine() for performance #60463
    area-System.IO, tenet-performance, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Fix XXHash for stripe size #61923
    * NO MERGE *, Servicing-consider, area-System.IO
  • [wasm][debugger] Protecting send message to debugger if it's disabled #61927
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM]: string.AsSpan() rewriting #1749
  • [NativeAOT] LNK1181: cannot open input file / Code 1181 #1748

Closed

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Question: Is it valid IR for phi args with common dominator to share a phi arg? #1731
  • There is no nuget package called "Microsoft.DotNet.ILCompiler" #1747

PullRequests

Created

  • Sync cgroup.cpp with dotnet/runtime #1746

Merged

  • Update samples to target .NET 6 #1745
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Add field to LclVarDsc to represent LLVM arg index #1716

Updated

  • Custom marshaller work. #1723

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • StaticWebAssets.xml not found when using SDK 6.0.100 and targeting NET5 #22737
  • `Version string portion was too short or too long` error while installing dotnet-dev-certs #22734

Closed

  • Cannot build with .NET Core 6 (and/or VS.NET 2022) #22727
  • RuntimeIdentifier in CSproj causing the CLR exception while debugging. #22709

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.2xx' => 'main' #22729
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Fix version comparison for dotnet tool install #22684
    Area-Tools

Updated

  • set encoding to UTF8 in case output is redirected (sdk-wide) #22713
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Respect opt-outs from dotnet/msbuild#7008 #22719

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Investigate update FAR-like features to show hits in shared-projects, not the projects the shared filed are linked into #57952
  • CSharpScript with Single File .NET6 not working #57947
  • Need to unify our file system abstractions #57941
    17.1
  • Strong name keys not read at compilation creation time #57940
  • C# Interactive: "#reset core" not available in `csi.exe` #57939
  • EditorConfig setting for csharp_new_line_before_open_brace is not saved correctly in Visual Studio #57937

Closed

  • CSharpRemoveUnusedValuesCodeFixProvider error #51737
    17.1
  • .Net 6 string interpolation for Int32 using a format specifier #57948
  • VisualStudio 2019 'UseSimpleUsingStatementCodeFixProvider' encountered an error and has been disabled. #57771
    17.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Add VS integration test pipeline #57953
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Simplify interpolation parsing - 3 #57951
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Simplify interpolation parsing - 2 #57946
    Area-Compilers
  • Simplify the code around parsing interpolated string literals. #57945
    Area-Compilers
  • Use !! in AddParameterCheck refactoring #57934
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Unify representation of an implicit `Index` indexer over an array and non-array types. #57918
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - List Patterns
  • Correctly specify our target folder #57950
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Unify the namespace for our FatalError type #57887
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.1 #57949
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Add test for unique FixIdDefinition exports #57933
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix remove-unused-variable for top-level-statements #57930
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #57807
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Merge release/dev17.1-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #57943
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #57944
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to release/dev17.1-vs-deps #57927
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to main #57926
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #57938
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #57929
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Use InvariantCulture for generated log file name in FileLogger ctor #57816
    Area-IDE, Next
  • use RTM version of nuget packages #57936
    Area-Infrastructure, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #57957
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #57956
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to release/dev17.1-vs-deps #57955
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to main #57954
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • List-patterns: add a few tests and add HasValidate flag #57914
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - List Patterns
  • List patterns: Skip compiler-generated dag nodes for better codegen #57909
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Handling defaults provided by IAsyncCompletionDefaultsSource #57685
    Area-IDE
  • Add IXamlEditAndContinueSolutionProvider for XAML Language Service #57932
    Area-IDE
  • Ensure we cache the previous item when two items are considered equal #57888
    Area-Compilers, 17.1
  • Transform the GeneratorDriver even if the Compilation was GCed #57721
    Area-IDE
  • When we're loading dependencies, don't require exact versions #56432
    Area-Analyzers
  • Fix generator caching in compiler server #57177
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators
  • API for getting a deterministic key for a Compilation #57134
    Area-Compilers
  • Method group conversion caching redo #57882
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Require definite assignment of all fields if struct includes any field initializers #57925
    Area-Compilers

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • signalr different "backends" for different hubs #38611
  • System.BadImageFormatException raised at random in deployed Azure App Service #38609
  • IIS functional test improvements #38608
  • Error using Microsoft.Extensions.Caching.StackExchangeRedis 6.0.0 #38606
  • Http/3 :status static response compression missing values #38604
  • Razor component wrong format. #38603
  • Update MouseEventArgs. Add MovementX MovementY #38602
  • Layout in project templates with individual auth is no longer centered in 6.0 apps #38600
  • Blazor app fails to run with JS error "Failed to invoke 'StartCircuit' due to an error on the server" after upgrading from .NET5 to .NET6 #38599
  • Razor Class Library - Static Web Assets that are being built during the pack process don't get added in Net6.0 #38596
  • Razor page not escaping @ in attributes #38595
  • SignalR Java Library method "On" not calling error when class type has wrong parameters #38593
  • Update StartupAnalyzer to recommend calling UseStatusCodePages after UseRouting #38591
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Clone StartupAnalyzer in to Framework analyzers #38590
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Blazor WebAssembly Hosted w/Individual Accounts does not work published to IIS. Multiple issues won't load. #38589
  • Blazor+WASM+Static hosting: Is the advice to use a fallback Brotli decoder correct? #38587
  • > I am trying to access IWebHostEnvironment in a class library, referenced by my web project. It contains my business logic. #38586
  • Blazor server side prefix url #38584

Closed

  • Pseudo header string reuse broken in .NET 6 #38581
  • Feature 'Edit and Continue' is currently unavailable due to an internal error. #38594
  • Blazor time to first UI improvement: blazorwasmbenchmark #38529
  • [Blazor] Investigate why CanUseComponentAndStaticContentFromExternalNuGetPackage fails on CI #34679
    7.0-preview1
  • [SPA] Add Connection: Keep-Alive header to the proxied requests #37681
    7.0-preview1
  • AuthorizeRouteView is missing the Policy Property #38525
  • Loading `appsettings.json` with 600 lines of "data" is very slow in blazor wasm #38555
  • Cannot use "checked" as variable name in razor file #38588
  • @microsoft/signalr V6.0.0 is not working on react-native apps #38286
    7.0-preview1
  • SkipStatusCodePagesAttribute should run before AuthorizeAttribute #10317
    17.1-Preview1

PullRequests

Created

  • HTTP/3: Remove request-only headers from enumerator #38610
    area-runtime
  • HTTP/3: Use all static status values #38605
    area-runtime
  • [release/6.0] Use window.document for React-Native #38598
    area-signalr, 6.0.x
  • Visual Studio 2022 Release installation #38592
    area-infrastructure, .NET 7.0

Merged

  • Support SkipStatusCodePages on endpoints and authorized routes #38509
    area-web-frameworks, 7.0-preview1
  • HTTP/3: Write static header names #38565
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • Fix Kestrel psuedo header reuse #38585
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • Use servicing template text in backport bot #38601
    7.0-preview1
  • Use window.document for React-Native #38340
    area-signalr, 7.0-preview1
  • HTTP/3: Remove TCS allocation with resettable value source #38560
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1

Updated

  • Split IISFunctionals startup/shadow copy tests #38575
    area-runtime
  • Don't copy authorization header during redirects in MvcTesting #38557
    area-mvc
  • Improve building ASP.NET Core directly on arm64 machines #38527
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Verify Roslyn compiler changes #38362
    area-infrastructure, * NO MERGE *, 6.0.x

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-23

Issues

Created

Merged

  • Merge main to stable branch for December release #2759

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Cannot reference MAUI-Blazor project from another MAUI-Blazor project on iOS #3536
  • Entry's Integer Keyboard #3534
  • BlazorWebView WPF/WinForms build targets are not in NUPKG #3533
    6.0.200-preview.11
  • Get xplat element from native view #3530
  • Maui deploy on Android corrupted System #3528
  • NuGet Package Update causes issue compiling for non-windows debugging #3527
  • WPF app with BlazorWebView fails to compile the Razor components #3526
  • Label text disappears in template app #3524
  • xamarin simulator Failed to install XXX. the app directory does not exists #3523
  • Android: SQLConnection.open Android: A connection was successfully established with the server, but then an error occurred during the pre-login handshake. (provider: TCP Provider, error: 35 - An internal exception was caught) #3522
  • Using a StackLayout with AndExpand causes some sort of layout loop/invalidation/re-add #3519
    6.0.200-preview.11

Closed

  • [BUG] MAUI Blazor App uses MAUI Control in webview #3531
  • [Enhancement] Rework LogListener to use new loggers #883
  • [Bug] Impossible to enforce nullable ref warning as errors. #1796
  • WPF/WinForms Blazor Desktop need to override WebViewManager to use static web assets #2252

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix Modal Appearing/Disappearing #3535
  • BlazorWebView WPF/WinForms build targets need to go into NUPKG #3532
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • Update Essentials Screenshot API, capture native frames. #3529
    partner/ui-tools, area/essentials 🍞
  • Trigger frame events when the frame changes #3521
    area/layout 🔲, 6.0.200-preview.11

Merged

  • [Core,Controls] Remove legacy Log and use ILogger #3401
    area/hosting 🧩
  • Several fixes and changes to the dispatchers #3453
    area/controls 🎮, 6.0.200-preview.11
  • Add extension to add an IView to a GridLayout at specific column/row #3484
    area/layout 🔲
  • Modifed XAML Source Generator to emit MemberNotNull attributes for named XAML controls #3497
    area/Xaml </>
  • Set the correct current page when popping #3515
  • Workaround #3514 #3516

Updated

  • FlyoutView Handler Android #3513
    area/shell 🐢
  • [Core] make Microsoft.Maui.dll trimmable #3249
  • [iOS, Windows, Android] Button border properties #3411
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮
  • Introduce IVisualDiagnosticsOverlay #3351
    partner/ui-tools, 6.0.200-preview.11
  • Provide a Date? so that Date can have a null value for UI elements to make it easier when user does not select a date #2306
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨
  • Allow to use string to define StrokeShape in XAML #3256
    area/Xaml </>, area/drawing ✏️
  • Implement touch events in GraphicsView #3261
    t/enhancement ☀️, area/drawing ✏️
  • Implement GoBack, GoForward and Reload methods in WebViewHandler #3316
    area/controls 🎮
  • Init Essentials #3345
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • Adds Tizen backend #2360
    area/setup 🪄
  • Essentials: Port xamarin/Essentials#1846 #2605
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Warn/throw when non-deterministic split query may return wrong results #26808
  • Altering a nullable column to be not nullable with a default value fails during migration #26807
  • Fix issues raised by static analysis #26805
    MQ
  • Unexpected decimal CAST to decimal(18,2) #26804
  • Adding graph of entries to already filled ChangeTracker #26803
  • DatabaseGeneratedOption.Identity not setting Identity = true in SQL #26802
  • [EF6.0, Firebird] Problem with NorthwindIncludeQueryTestBase.Repro9735 #26801
  • Update optional dependents message to indicate non-null value rather than non-default #26800
  • Improve experience for data binding and graphical interfaces #26799
    7.0.0
  • Modernize EF Core tooling #26798
    7.0.0
  • Improve change tracking and update performance #26797
    7.0.0
  • Improve performance in the TechEmpower composite score #26796
    7.0.0

Closed

  • Can't concat/union two IQueryable<> of types inherited from one parent #26762
  • [Q] SqlServerConventionSetBuilder and valueGenerationConvention [SqlServerValueGenerationConvention] #26789
  • Cannot add new migrations in .NET 6 EF Core #26673

PullRequests

Created

  • Automatic refactorings based on static analysis of EFCore project #26806

Merged

  • Bump SQLitePCLRaw.core from 2.0.6 to 2.0.7 #26786
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Bump SQLitePCLRaw.bundle_sqlite3 from 2.0.6 to 2.0.7 #26788
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Bump SQLitePCLRaw.bundle_e_sqlite3 from 2.0.6 to 2.0.7 #26785
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Bump SQLitePCLRaw.bundle_e_sqlcipher from 2.0.6 to 2.0.7 #26787
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Bump SQLitePCLRaw.bundle_winsqlite3 from 2.0.6 to 2.0.7 #26784
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:

Updated

  • Fix ValueGenerated On Add Or Update, , make ValueGeneratedOnUpdate() and ValueGeneratedOnAddOrUpdate() working #26713
  • Call sync connection close instead of async #26793
    Servicing-approved, 6.0.2
  • Suppress warnings on uninitialized DbSet properties #26795
  • [release/2.1] Move off expiring machine pools #26794
    area-infrastructure
  • [6.0.x] Fix to #26451 - Temporal Table: Owned Entities support #26526
    Servicing-consider
  • Don't discover navigations to Dictionary<> and non-owned STETs #26769

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Create debian packages for armhf architecture #12725
  • .NET 6.0 installation location is missing on installation wizard within a clean Windows OS #12722

PullRequests

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.2xx' => 'main' #12706

Updated

  • source-build patches needed to get 6.0.2xx building #12718
